message:
If by "view", you mean a UI element (e.g., WPF control), then I recommend:  
1) Initializing the view into a "loading" state.  
2) Calling CalculateMandelbrot via Task.Run.  
3) Wrapping that task in something like my NotifyTask type.  
4) Using data binding to update the UI when the calculation completes.

On the other hand, if by "view", you mean an ASP.NET MVC page, then I would recommend just calling CalculateMandelbrot directly.
